mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_comment (id, video_id, user_id, content, parent_id, reply_user_id, like_count, status, is_deleted, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{videoId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{replyUserId}, #{likeCount}, #{status}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE video_comment SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video_comment WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND status = 1
SELECT c.*, u.nickname, u.avatar_url, ru.nickname AS reply_nickname FROM video_comment c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_user ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.*, u.nickname, u.avatar_url FROM video_comment c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.video_id = #{videoId} AND c.parent_id = 0 AND c.status = 1 AND c.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT c.*, u.nickname, u.avatar_url, ru.nickname AS reply_nickname FROM video_comment c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_user ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} AND c.status = 1 AND c.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
LIMIT #{limit}
